meanings.definition: Able to use both hands equally well.
meanings.sent1: She was ambidextrously talented in painting with both hands.
meanings.sent2: The ambidextrously skilled musician played the piano effortlessly with either hand.
meanings.sent3: The ambidextrously gifted artist could paint two different pictures at the same time!
meanings.sent4: Her ambidextrously coordinated movements on the dance floor were like watching a graceful symphony.
meanings.sent5: The ambidextrously versatile chef could chop vegetables with precision using either hand.

meanings.definition: In a way that shows skill or ability with both hands.
meanings.sent1: He played the guitar ambidextrously, strumming with finesse using both hands.
meanings.sent2: The juggler ambidextrously tossed the balls back and forth between his hands.
meanings.sent3: The magician ambidextrously pulled rabbits out of hats with flair and panache.
meanings.sent4: The basketball player ambidextrously dribbled the ball down the court, leaving defenders in awe.
meanings.sent5: The surgeon ambidextrously performed the delicate operation, showcasing exceptional skill with both hands.
